It says that the google link has closed
My client's highlight tool hasn't worked in months. Why is external recording (like shadowplay) not qualified?

Because we want the contest to be accessible, but also for players to be on even ground. Not everyone has access to shadowplay or editing software, but everyone who plays League (theoretically) has access to the replay tools.

If it comes up with any specific errors, I'd recommend ticketing support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If it doesn't, a clean reinstall using the Hextech Repair Tool is going to cover most bases.
Great idea this is what I have been playing League of Legends for! Great Great GREAT! Plus Ultra!
To be clear, unfortunately, this contest is only available for OCE players. We would still love to see your entry but as an NA player you won't be eligible for prizing.
I just realized lol that I was in Australia for the time of posting. All is good!
